newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico's Nafin sells $18.4 mln in dlr auction.
newsitem.headline: Mexico's Nafin sells $18.4 mln in dlr auction.

text.p: State development bank Nacional Financiera (Nafin) on Friday said it sold $18.4 million in its last dollar auction on Sept. 24.
In its eighth short-term dollar auction and its fourth medium- and long-term sale, it said interest rates remained at the levels of the previous auction.

It said it received seven bids from five banks for 12-month, three- to five-year and five- to seven-year terms. A new term offered, seven to 10 years, was not bid for, nor was the term of one to three years.
The next auction would be held on Oct. 29, with bids due Oct. 15, Nafin said. -- Henry Tricks, Mexico City newsroom +525 728-9560
